entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of freezing rain beginning early in the evening then changing to rain overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
